channel.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help[PI]
channel.description:
Okay, so today I added a new quest to my rsps. Its called the "Nut Hunt". There is a Monkey's Uncle asking you to pick 1000 monkey nuts from down the manhole. But.. You know when you start a quest. It would usually not tell you what to do again and it would have a different dialogue. Well.. You can just keep doing my quest over and over again. It gives you the items and deletes the 1000 monkey nuts noted. But I don't know how to make it so after you have spoke to him once, you can't make him say that again on the same account.. Instead it would say, "Hey! Aren't you supposed to be hurrying with those nuts!". Please help.
EDIT: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2je8xom.jpg[/img] This is my quest tab How do I change the name of "The Knight's Sword" to something like this. [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2eebo6p.jpg[/img] Please help with this aswell.

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @smokerboy239 smokerboy239
item.description:
@smokerboy239 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:2, topic:397116”]To change the name of the quest go into Client.java and search for

Under that along with the rest of them add

Cheers. :)[/quote]Dude… What I mean is, if I now add that, when you hover over it it says “The Knight’s Sword”. Where do I change that and how do I change that to “The Nut Hunt” or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help[PI]

item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

To change the name of the quest go into Client.java and search for

Under that along with the rest of them add

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @smokerboy239 smokerboy239
item.description:
@smokerboy239 wrote:

Okay, so today I added a new quest to my rsps. Its called the “Nut Hunt”. There is a Monkey’s Uncle asking you to pick 1000 monkey nuts from down the manhole. But… You know when you start a quest. It would usually not tell you what to do again and it would have a different dialogue. Well… You can just keep doing my quest over and over again. It gives you the items and deletes the 1000 monkey nuts noted. But I don’t know how to make it so after you have spoke to him once, you can’t make him say that again on the same account… Instead it would say, “Hey! Aren’t you supposed to be hurrying with those nuts!”. Please help.

EDIT: This is my quest tab
How do I change the name of “The Knight’s Sword” to something like this.
Please help with this aswell.

Read full topic
